argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_drngring | |- ( R e. DivRing -> R e. Ring ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 0g ` R ) = ( 0g ` R ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1r ` R ) = ( 1r ` R ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_drngunz | |- ( R e. DivRing -> ( 1r ` R ) =/= ( 0g ` R ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 2 | #P_isnzr | |- ( R e. NzRing <-> ( R e. Ring /\ ( 1r ` R ) =/= ( 0g ` R ) ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 4, 5 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( R e. DivRing -> R e. NzRing ) |
